response.original_title: Kung fu masters of the zodiac:Origins of the twelve
response.overview: Kung Fu Masters of the Zodiac: Origins of the Twelve is a 2009 animated television series based on Chinese mythology of the Zodiac.The produced and chief planned by Ming Li.Directed by Xuhui Xing and Ying Ao.Production directed by Vicent Rong,Jerry Gao,Mice Liu and Wel Wang.Art supervised by Bin Wu.Production supervised by Fuyuan Liu and Fox Wu.Chief directed by Leon Ding.Written by Bin Wu and Zhe Hou.
response.title: Kung fu masters of the zodiac:Origins of the twelve
